Name: Trinity
Ingredients: 5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherries .
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Review: A Dry Manhattan -based on Scotch with a dash of apricot liqueur and a touch of créme de menthe.
History: Adapted from a recipe in David A. Embury 's 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Trinity contains 192 calories
